channel.title: David. Greeny. 08. Petition
channel.description:
I fail to see the point of why these two haven't been made global moderators.
David is with out a doubt the nicest, coolest, nicest person on these forums. Honestly, I think he would be one of the best globals we've had.
Why are you so worried about Greeny and his elitist attitude. Greeny is just Greeny. You can't blame him for getting tired of all the shit that is posted on the forums that enrages him.
You give Bebe mod after quiting for something like 6 months. I'm sorry to say but she hasn't done very much since being modded.
Why don't you listen to the community for once, Moparisthebest? [other admins do though; credits to Lothy and Niall]
So sign here for these two to be modded. The mod who locks this shows abuse.

item.title: David. Greeny. 08. Petition
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

As a current member of the staff team you know not to post such topics.

Read full topic
